body.name: Fanhaw 20 Oz Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Chug Lid - Leak & Sweat Proof with Anti-Dust Lid (Green Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 13 mins
features: ONE-HANDED OPERATING LID - Fanhaw insulated water bottle comes with a dust-proof flip lid, it adopts one-click opening technology. With only one hand, can open the lid conveniently.
DISHWASHER SAFE - Fanhaw stainless steel water bottle is dishwasher safe. It can help you to free your hands from your complicated housework. NOTE: the lid is not dishwasher safe.
FOOD-GRADE 18/8 STAINLESS STEEL - The Fanhaw sports water bottle is made of food-grade 18/8 stainless steel that is 100% BPA-free, odor-free, toxic-free. It will never leave a metal taste or rust.

DOUBLE-WALL VACUUM INSULATED - Say goodbye to "SWEAT"! The double wall insulation makes the Fanhaw insulated water bottles sweat-free. It keeps your beverages cold for up to 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

CLASSIC AND DURABLE POWDER COAT - The powder coat exterior finish is classic. It assures that the exterior finish of Fanhaw kids water bottle for school is durable. It won't peel off even though you use it for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of drinking water from this bottle
reviews.reviewText: Title: Exceptional Fanhaw 20 Oz Water Bottle - A Family Favorite!I recently acquired the Fanhaw 20 Oz Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle in the striking Green Blue shade, and it has truly exceeded all expectations. This purchase was influenced by Amazon's recommendation, and I am thrilled with my decision.The leak and sweat-proof design make this water bottle a standout, offering a worry-free experience during workouts and daily activities. The chug lid is not only convenient but also ensures a smooth and easy drinking experience – no spills, no mess.What sets this water bottle apart is the added bonus of the anti-dust lid, a thoughtful touch that guarantees each sip is clean and refreshing. The Green Blue color is not only visually appealing but also makes it easy to spot in a crowd.However, what truly impressed me is the ease of drinking water from this bottle. The design allows for effortless sipping, and everyone in my family has found it to be a pleasure to use. It has quickly become a favorite for each member.The stainless steel construction provides durability, and the insulation keeps beverages at the desired temperature for an extended period. This water bottle has seamlessly integrated into my daily routine, catering to my active lifestyle with style and efficiency.In conclusion, the Fanhaw 20 Oz Water Bottle is nothing short of exceptional. It has earned its place as a family favorite, receiving a solid 5-star rating from all of us! If you're searching for a reliable, stylish, and user-friendly water bottle, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No soft plastics…Tough and insulated. Looks good, too!
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my cycling classes at the YMCA. I selected this model because of the snap-open top that lets me grab a drink with the push of a button. Holds about 21 ounces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected.
reviews.reviewText: It's just a water bottle, right? I wanted to replace a water bottle that has leaked in my gym bag several times. I found this one during Prime Days. A little difficult to get the shrink wrap off of the top and then figure out how the top works. There is a large hook that can be lifted to carry the bottle. And, there is a lower latch that prevents the bottle from accidentally opening. You must release the lower latch to use the bottle. Once the lower latch is released everything works perfectly. One press of a button and the top flips up. The spout is easy to drink from with an additional air hole that keeps the water flowing smoothly. Very well designed and easy to use. It keeps my water cold. And despite its 20 oz. size the bottle fits in my car's cup holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small enough to carry around, but big enough to stay hydrated
reviews.reviewText: I bought this water bottle for deployment and it lasted the entire 8 months. Mind you I’ve dropped it in hard surfaces and from high heights, yet at most all it got was a little dent in it and some chipped paint. Easy to wash. The mouth piece was my favorite part about the bottle because you could unlock it and lock it very easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable customer support and a solid product
reviews.reviewText: My bottle arrived with a defect that caused it to leak. After seeing my two star review their customer support reached out and offered to send me a new lid. The new lid resolved the issue. When functioning correctly this is a fantastic water bottle at a steal of a price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very durable, no more straws!
reviews.reviewText: We love this brand of water bottle! My kids use them for school they are durable, keep water cold and come in so many fun colors. I love they don’t have a straw. The lock feature works very well. Great pick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and works well
reviews.reviewText: I like water bottle because it keeps drinks cold for many hours and the top makes it way to use. I use it only for cold drinks and even if left in the car on warm days, the drink stays cold and the ice doesn't melt. The top has a locking cap that opens and allows you to drink without unscrewing the whole top. I liked the 20 oz bottle so much that I recently bought a 24 oz bottle to take to the gym. I've also talked to their customer and service and they've been great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love them! Highly Recommended
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for stainless steel, insulated 40 oz water bottles that my kids and I could use during our cruise. They are beautifullly designed in colors, but the straps are thick and beautiful, plus it includes a clip to attach to a bag if needed. It keeps drinks cold for several hours, the lock is simple to use. No leakage. You can also use for hot beverages if you'd like too. These would also make great gifts for big water drinkers!
Fits in our bike bottle carrier. Used it gor first time today. Kept our drinks Icy cold. Looks great. Like the flip top that keeps the mouth part clean. Love the blue green colour.
I love that there are not a ton of tiny pieces and parts to clean. They're durable, provide a good flow with no effort and they do not leak. I have two and will buy more.

I really wasn't sure what to expect, and have been ever so impressed. Very large capacity, doesn't leak, and attractive/unique in colour so easy to identify as mine. I love that it can handle going through the dishwasher (bottom part, not lid) without dulling or chipping or anything. Here's the thing: I bought it to hold soda pop - and it can handle the fizz without leaking or exploding or doing anything weird. Also to give an idea of the size, it holds 3 standard size cans of Diet Coke at a time. Wow. I'd buy it again if I ever needed another one, but I have a feeling this one will stand the test of time. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as durable as you would think
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bottle for my son for school. Being mostly steel I thought it would hold up well. He's not particularly hard on his things and his last steel bottle (different brand) lasted him well over 5 years. This bottle only lasted a few short months. The bottom became separated from the bottle at a seam and started leaking. There's not even a scratch on it yet. Super disappointed for the price of this. **Update, the seller reached out to me and was fantastic to work with. They replaced the bottle no questions asked.
I don't like water bottles with straws. This bottle is just what I was looking for. I like the colour, size and ease of use.
